notes: DeepPurpose requires descriptastorus and compatible rdkit/torch. The Dockerfile has special handling for DeepPurpose (adds descriptastorus) but only if pipreqs detects 'DeepPurpose' in the agent's code. Note the capitalization: 'DeepPurpose' not 'deeppurpose'. The instruction_override ensures agents use the correct import: 'from DeepPurpose import utils, models'.
